parts:

content.name: tool_error
content.text:
The outbound call did not succeed, inform the user succinctly but keep important details intact. The complete interaction data follows: An error occurred with your deployment

FUNCTION_INVOCATION_TIMEOUT

sfo1::8wlsf-1749353863329-79d74b8a6229

parts:
I tried to fetch the songs in your **‚ÄúLiked Songs Motherfucker‚Äù** playlist, but there was a timeout issue on Spotify‚Äôs end and the request didn‚Äôt go through.

You can try again in a moment, or let me know if you'd like me to work with a different playlist for now‚Äîor even create something new inspired by your liked songs.
